rules.name: ContactTypeBothValidation
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND ( 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7)
rules.label: ContactTypeBothValidation

Flow.description: This flow is used to create Case from CPM Community for guest users - Added COSMOS fields
Flow.interviewLabel: New CPM Case in CPM Community {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: New CPM Case in CPM Community

screens.description: Please Provide External Contact Name/Email/Phone number
screens.name: ContactType_External_Validation_Messages_Screen
screens.label: ContactType External Validation Messages Screen

fields.name: ContactTypeExternalValidationMessage
fields.fieldText: Please fill in external contact name/email/phone number, please click on previous.

fields.name: ContactTypeInternalValidationMessage
fields.fieldText: Please fill in internal contact name/email/phone number, please click on previous.

fields.name: ContactTypeBothValidationMessage
fields.fieldText: Please fill in both internal and external contact name/email/phone number, please click on previous.

fields.name: CPM_Community_Last_Screen
fields.fieldText: Thank you for case submission, here is the case reference number {!CaseData.CaseNumber}.

fields.name: MandatoryFieldsErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: Please fill in all required fields, please click on previous.

validationRule.errorMessage: Submitter First Name Length should not be greater then 100 characters
Submitter Last Name Length should not be greater then 100 characters
Please enter valid input data
Internal Contact Name Length should not be greater then 50 characters
Please enter valid phone number
Please enter valid email address
External Contact Name Length should not be greater then 50 characters
Please enter valid phone number
Please enter valid email address
Referral # Length should not be greater then 25 characters
Project Description Length should not be greater then 255 characters
Provider ID Length should not be greater then 20 characters
Provider Group Name/Provider Name Length should not be greater then 75 characters
Provider TIN must be a 9 digit number or enter 'multiple' if you have many TINs.

fields.name: C_S_T_X_Product
fields.helpText: Use ctrl button to select more than one value

validationRule.errorMessage: Claim Examples Length should not be greater then 55 characters
Issue Description should not be blank and should be less than 32768 characters
Expected Outcome Length should not be greater then 32768 characters
Remediation Details length should be less than 1000 characters
Timely Reconsideration Details Length should not be greater then 1000 characters
Referral ID Length should not be greater then 100 characters
Standard Operating Procedure Name Length should not be greater then 100 characters
Source of Truth Detail Length should not be greater then 1000 characters

fields.name: ProjectSubmissionValidationMessage
fields.fieldText: Please fill in all required fields, please click on previous.
